company_profile.registered_address: H No 101A, Deep Enclave, Gali No 8, Vikas Nagar, Uttam Nagar West, Delhi, India, 110059
alternate_public_references: Daniel David (publicly shown on some profiles)
company_profile.business_activity: Other information technology and computer service activities n.e.c. (AI solutions, chatbots, LLM services, custom software)
company_profile.unique_model_statement: Fynorra ka majority workflow AI automation aur intelligent AI agents ke through operate hota hai â€” client onboarding, support, and many delivery workflows are handled or augmented by AI agents.
company_profile.notes_and_caveats: Public records confirm incorporation date, CIN, address and listed directors. Some public profiles show alternate names; employee counts are estimated. Do not present unverified items as confirmed without human verification.

services.short_description: Website/WhatsApp chatbot for FAQs and lead capture (no heavy LLM).
services.deployment_steps: requirements -> wireframe -> build (dialog flows) -> test -> integrate -> launch
services.integration_points: website widget, WhatsApp API, CRM contact sync, analytics
services.third_party_costs: Chat platform fees, hosting, CRM connector fees
services.sales_pitch: Reduce missed leads & answer FAQs 24/7; fast ROI via captured leads.
services.risk_and_mitigation: Poor UX -> mitigate with a short discovery + 2 UX rounds.

services.short_description: Retrieval-augmented chatbot using embeddings + LLM for accurate, contextual answers.
services.deployment_steps: data collection -> embeddings -> vector DB -> RAG pipeline -> LLM integration -> test -> launch
services.integration_points: website widget, WhatsApp, CRM, knowledge base, support tickets
services.third_party_costs: LLM API (OpenAI/Azure), vector DB (Pinecone/Qdrant), hosting, embedding costs
services.sales_pitch: Context-aware answers from your docs â€” fewer escalations, higher conversions.

services.short_description: AI-powered voice agents for call centers (IVR automation + conversational voice).
services.deployment_steps: call-flow design -> speech model selection -> integration with telephony -> testing -> rollout
services.third_party_costs: Telephony minutes, STT/TTS API, model inference costs
services.sales_pitch: Cut call handling costs and improve first-call resolution.
services.risk_and_mitigation: IVR misrouting -> thorough user testing and fallback human handoff.

services.short_description: Invoice, contract, and form extraction + automation pipelines.
services.deployment_steps: sample docs -> label -> model selection -> pipeline build -> integrate -> QA
services.integration_points: ERP/Accounting systems, CRM, storage (S3), workflow engine
services.third_party_costs: OCR API, storage costs, labeling costs if needed
services.sales_pitch: Automate invoice & contract handling to speed operations and reduce errors.
services.risk_and_mitigation: Low accuracy on noisy docs -> iterative labeling & validation.

services.short_description: Automate lead routing, enrichment, and CRM workflows.
services.deployment_steps: map fields -> build integration connectors -> test -> deploy -> monitor
services.sales_pitch: Faster lead follow-up and fewer manual handoffs.
services.risk_and_mitigation: Data mismatches -> field mapping checklist + test plan.

services.short_description: Automated content creation pipelines with templates & tuning.
services.deployment_steps: content templates -> model choice -> prompt engineering -> workflow -> QA
services.integration_points: CMS, marketing stack, ad platforms, analytics
services.third_party_costs: LLM API usage, image/video tools (if needed)
services.sales_pitch: Scale content creation while keeping brand voice consistent.
services.risk_and_mitigation: Low-quality output -> human editor + style guide + few-shot prompts.

services.short_description: Automated bid/creative optimization for paid channels.
services.deployment_steps: baseline analytics -> model + rules -> connect ad accounts -> test -> iterate
services.integration_points: Google Ads, Meta Ads, analytics, CRM
services.third_party_costs: Ad spend (client), API access, model inference costs
services.sales_pitch: Increase ROI on ad spend via automated optimization.
services.risk_and_mitigation: Short-term performance dips -> A/B test windows and safe-guards.

services.deployment_steps: data ingestion -> modeling -> dashboard build -> validation -> handover
services.typical_team: 1 data engineer, 1 data scientist, 1 BI dev
services.third_party_costs: BI licenses, hosting, model inference costs
services.sales_pitch: Turn data into forecasts and actionable alerts.
services.risk_and_mitigation: Bad data -> start with data audit and clear KPIs.

services.short_description: Tailored solutions with domain-specific compliance and features.
services.deployment_steps: domain discovery -> compliance scoping -> build -> validation -> deploy
services.integration_points: EHRs, payment gateways, inventory systems, CRM
services.typical_team: extended team incl. domain SME, ML eng, devs, QA, PM
services.third_party_costs: Compliance audits, specialized APIs, extra testing
services.sales_pitch: Solve domain problems with compliant AI â€” reduce risk and increase automation.
services.risk_and_mitigation: Regulatory risk -> compliance review, DPA, audits, encryption-at-rest.

services.short_description: Custom LLM fine-tuning / retrieval + enterprise knowledge assistant.
services.deployment_steps: data ingest -> clean -> fine-tune or configure -> test -> deploy -> monitor
services.integration_points: Internal docs, SSO, intranet, ticketing, data stores
services.typical_team: ML engineers, DevOps, data engineers, PM, security SME
services.third_party_costs: GPU-hosting (e.g. p4d), API usage, vector DB, fine-tuning compute, monitoring
services.sales_pitch: Enterprise-grade assistant with your knowledge â€” improves employee productivity.
services.risk_and_mitigation: High cost & drift -> phased rollout and strong monitoring + retraining plan.

rag_formatted.text:
Q: What is Fynorra?

A: Fynorra is an AI-first consulting firm that builds custom AI assistants, chatbot sales teams, and integrates AI into CRM/website to increase leads and automate customer support.

Q: Which services does Fynorra offer?

A: AI chatbots, CRM/CMS integration, Cloud & DevOps, custom copilots, AI sales automation and analytics.

Q: How long does integration take?

A: Typical small-site integration takes 3â€“7 business days; full CRM integration usually requires 2â€“4 weeks depending on complexity.

Q: What pricing plans do you have?

A: Starter plans begin around â‚¹5,000/month. Exact pricing is customized based on your needs â€” our team will share a tailored proposal.

Q: Do you provide multilingual bots?

A: Yes â€” Hindi, English, and regional languages; we customize tone per audience.

Q: Can you handle payments and invoicing?

A: Yes â€” we integrate with major payment gateways and automate invoice generation and reminders.

Q: How do I book a demo?

A: ðŸ‘‰ You can book a 20-minute demo at fynorra.ai/contact, or reply 'Demo' and our team will reach out within 48 hours.

Q: Do you offer free trials?

A: We offer a 7-day pilot for qualified clients; eligibility is confirmed after a short discovery call.

Q: How secure is my data?

A: We use encryption in-transit & at-rest, and support NDA/DSA, GDPR, and HIPAA (for healthcare clients).

Q: Will the bot pass leads to my CRM?

A: Yes â€” we push leads via API/webhooks into Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, or your custom CRM.

Q: What industries do you serve?

A: E-commerce, fintech, education, healthcare, real estate, logistics, and SMBs needing lead automation.

Q: How do you improve bot performance?

A: We run weekly analytics, retrain intents, and refine prompts based on real conversations.

Q: What is Fynorraâ€™s onboarding process?

A: Discovery call â†’ Prototype â†’ Pilot â†’ Production â†’ Ongoing optimization.

Q: Can you write sales outreach messages?

A: Yes â€” we craft LinkedIn and email sequences to convert leads and automate follow-ups.

Q: What if the bot gives a wrong answer?

A: We provide human fallback routing and an admin dashboard to patch knowledge quickly.

Q: Do you host the solution or provide on-prem?

A: We offer both SaaS (cloud-hosted) and on-premise installations for enterprise customers.

Q: How to cancel subscription?

A: Contact support with 30 daysâ€™ notice; billing terms are in the contract.

Q: Can you integrate voice/IVR?

A: Yes â€” voice assistants and IVR integrations are available as an add-on.

Q: Can you generate reports?

A: Yes â€” weekly/monthly lead reports, conversion rates, and ROI dashboards.

Q: How quickly can we scale?

A: Our architecture scales from single-site pilots to multi-site enterprise rollouts within weeks.
